text: Robbie Robertson (July 5, 1943 â€“ August 9, 2023) was an American singer- songwriter and actor. He was announced his death in Los Angeles on August 9, 2023, at the age of 80, after a year-long illness with prostate cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Article at thecanadianencyclopedia.ca * Article at canadianbands.com *Robbie Robertson Interview at NAMM Oral History Collection (2017) Category:1943 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American singer-songwriters
